title: Have been waiting in Queue over 2hours and keeps refreshing 5minutes
body: I've been having trouble joining queue because last game i kept getting a really annoying disconnection every minute in the game ({{champion:40}} happened twice) so the leaver buster made me wait for 5 minutes, then i kept refreshing everytime in hits 1?

replies.body:
welcome to season 5, leavebuster punishes AFK/TROLLS with no remorse.

if you have been punished its because your a multiple offender, it warns you on the first AFK then punishes you after that, and the punishment gets worse the more you AFK..


my suggestion is to stop AFK'ing (which we all know your doing) and start being part of the team


Kind Regards
when will the punishment be over?
His average queue time is incredibly long. Yesterday he was in queue for about 112 minutes.
You should have a look at Raydere lol. His queue times are ridiculous.
